reviews.text: Very nice spot, with sea view when you come out, very nice
Beautiful cathedral ! We've had a good office with a welcoming priest
Hardly a cathedral. Dont go there
Off-putting from the street, then charming inside, this is a nice half hour break from the city. Kids would like it.
nice place but the guides doesnt speak english
Excelente lugar para enseñar a niños sobre historia natural
Um dos museus mais baratos e imperdíveis de Cochabamba! Bem organizado e com muita história!

Well restored national theater of Athens. Two venues inside the same building, the old historic one, beautifully kept, and a smaller space for more experimental theater. Always top level theater performances of the National Theater. You just can't go wrong by attending a theater performances there. Always too quality level word, and totally not staid!!!

My favorite theater in Athens. The building is amazing and the time you spend there always with hight quality. The area is not that safe but it worth it. Take the metro and choose omonia metro station. It is like 2’ walking from there. Do not hesitate to take an outside photo and of course to enjoy any event, just to realize the unique feeling. Sometimes there are offers on the tickets.
Such a superb place to be. Great theatrical plays on the stage, historical building with modern commodities - stage, lights, new wing!
A great theater for great plays, always enjoyed when I visit
Theater always decent but sometimes excellent
